A: 1. Peaceful Co-existence means different people living together in _ (a) war (b) peace (c) anger)?
2. Jesus taught us to live _ with others (a) angrily (b) peacefully (c) selfishly)?
3. If someone offends us, Jesus advised us to _ them (a) fight (b) forgive (c) ignore)?
4. God wants us to live peacefully with others in the _ (a) desert (b) community (c) mountains)?
5. Esau and Jacob _ after Jacob took Esau's blessings (a) fought (b) reconciled (c) separated)?
6. Philemon and Onesimus are examples of people desiring peaceful _ (a) conflict (b) co-existence (c) rivalry)?
7. Isaac and Abimelech showed a desire for peaceful _ (a) disagreement (b) co-existence (c) argument)?
8. Abraham prevented a quarrel between him and his nephew _ (a) Cain (b) Abel (c) Lot)?
9. It is good to show _ to others (a) hatred (b) love (c) indifference)?
10. Jesus wants us to show love and _ to people (a) hostility (b) hospitality (c) anger)?
11. We should tell people the _ (a) lies (b) truth (c) stories)?
12. Jonathan and David showed _ love to each other (a) selfish (b) unselfish (c) false)?
13. Jonathan loved David as his own _ (a) neighbor (b) brother (c) soul)?
14. King Saul was Jonathan's _ (a) friend (b) father (c) uncle)?
15. King Saul planned to _ David (a) help (b) kill (c) praise)?
16. Jonathan _ David from King Saul's plans (a) joined (b) saved (c) betrayed)?
17. Jonathan hid David in a place far away from _ sight (a) David's (b) Saul's (c) Jonathan's)?
18. Jonathan and David made a _ (a) promise (b) covenant (c) agreement)?
19. Pupils should _ their belongings with others (a) hide (b) share (c) keep)?
20. We should _ one another when there is danger (a) avoid (b) protect (c) ignore)?
B: 1. Living together without disagreement is called _________ _________.
2. Who taught us to live peacefully with others? _________
3. Which two brothers reconciled after one took the other's blessings? _________ and _________
5. What did Jonathan and David make together? _________
C: 1. List two examples of people in the Bible who desired peaceful co-existence.
2. Who showed unselfish love to David?
3. What is one way pupils can show love to one another?
4. What did Jonathan do to save David from Saul's plan?
5. What is the meaning of Peaceful Co-existence?
answers_C: Esau and Jacob, Abraham and Lot
He told David Saul's plans and hid him
Different people living together in peace
